job_details.Functieomschrijving: As a back-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.
job_details.full_text:
Back End Developer

As a back-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and integrating systems around LLM infrastructure and traditional AI models, focusing on scalability and reliability. This aligns with the GenAI Engineer profile's responsibility for developing and maintaining production-grade software systems that leverage generative models, and the Software Development (TASK4) and Operations Engineering (MLOps) (TASK5) aspects crucial for such systems.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Back End Developer' and 'back-end engineer' directly relate to building and maintaining the software systems that support AI infrastructure.
The focus on 'scalability and reliability of the systems' points to traditional software engineering practices for robust applications.
job_tasks.phrase: ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure' indicates direct work with generative AI models.
The inclusion of 'traditional AI models' suggests involvement in the modeling aspect, even if the primary focus is on the surrounding infrastructure.
The emphasis on 'scalability and reliability' in the context of AI infrastructure implies the need for robust deployment and maintenance practices, which fall under MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models
